main.description: An action verb defining the kind of flow and its behavior.

actionId.description: The canonical identifier for this action type

label.description: The display label defined for the network for the unit of measure, overrides om.

inputOutput.description: Denotes if a process input or output, or not applicable to a process.

pairsWith.description: The action that usually affects the same resource as a complement in the same flow.

createResource.description: The action can create an economic resource.

eventQuantity.description: The event quantity applicable is resource quantity, effort quantity, or both.

accountingEffect.description: The increment and/or decrement effect the action will have on the accounting quantity of an inventoried resource.

onhandEffect.description: The increment and/or decrement effect the action will have on the onhand quantity of an inventoried resource.

locationEffect.description: This action can update the current location of an inventoried resource.

containedEffect.description: The contained in resource should be updated or removed.

accountableEffect.description: The primaryAccountable should be updated to the event receiver, or not.

stageEffect.description: The stage of the inventoried resource should be updated, or not.

stateEffect.description: The state of the from or to inventoried resource should be updated, or not.
